title: HDT Bio's Zika and HIV vaccines generate immune responses in pregnant rabbits and their offspring
author: Helen Floersh
description: A new type of RNA vaccine against HIV and the Zika virus induces strong antibody responses in the offspring of pregnant animals, according to researchers from Seattle-based biopharma HDT Bio. | HDT Bio's repRNA vaccines against HIV and the Zika virus induced strong antibody proliferation in the offspring of pregnant rabbits.
